document_data.name: Purify Water
document_data.mainbody: '''''Purify water''''' was an [[divine magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster to cleanse water and make it safe to drink.
document_data.Effects: This spell purified dirty or contaminated water making it safe to drink. The reverse of this spell, '''''contaminate water''''', had the opposite effect.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was used commonly by [[noble marid]]s.
